body:
There used to be one, idk what happened to it.

But that link shouldn't give anyone access to your account. It just redirects to the real invite link.

There used to be one, idk what happened to it.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

https://github.com/captainmeta4
author.bio_html:
Ruqqus cofounder and lead backend developer.

https://github.com/captainmeta4

body:
There is no more regular invite link. We use the linking to automatically apply nicknames and Premium status on discord. Basically, we get your discord account ID, save it as a property on your Ruqqus account, pull you into the server, apply names/roles, and promptly forget the auth token for your account.

This can be seen here: https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/blob/master/ruqqus/routes/discord.py#L41-L166
body_html:
There is no more regular invite link. We use the linking to automatically apply nicknames and Premium status on discord. Basically, we get your discord account ID, save it as a property on your Ruqqus account, pull you into the server, apply names/roles, and promptly forget the auth token for your account.

This can be seen here: https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/blob/master/ruqqus/routes/discord.py#L41-L166
